King Tut's remains. They broke a statue of a panther and several others, according to a previous report in The Epoch Times. Reuters reported that the looters also damaged some mummies. All of the museums in Egypt, 24 in total, are safe and unharmed; only the Egyptian Museum, Cairo, was broken into, reads a Wednesday posting on the website of Zahi Hawass , Egypt's Minister of Antiquities.
